metadata.synopsis: The kids start running away and shout that they are following the protocol for when a fight happens in the creche.Only the main kid says a line since they disappear pretty quickly and there likely won't be time for two lines. The shorter the better.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Plays automatically when the player starts a fight in the dormitory when the kids are around.

0.speaker: Zel'i
0.text: A fight! Time to follow protocol...
